00175     bool m_sendIntialPresence;

00177     bool m_sendRosterRequest;
00178     // interval in seconds, if zero won't ping
00179     int m_keepAliveInterval;
00180     // interval in seconds, if zero won't timeout
00181     int m_keepAliveTimeout;
00182     // will keep reconnecting if disconnected, default is true
00183     bool m_autoReconnectionEnabled;
00184     bool m_useSASLAuthentication; 
00185 
00186
